input.sentences: the picnic site was roped off with yellow caution tape .
the hippie 's van was covered with colorful art .
inside the van was a shrine | and colorful art .
the three planet of the apes monkeys were easily recognizable .

output.sentences: The area by the beach was cordoned off for the parade.
There were many colorful displays and floats participating in the parade.
There were several vendors selling all types of things at the parade.
My friends and I bought monkey astronaut costumes so we can participate in the parade next year.
After the parade was over we enjoyed a bonfire on the beach.
